document.full_text: the labor dispute between nfl players and owners appeared at an impasse on thursday as both sides waited for a federal judge's ruling on the players' request to lift a league-imposed lockout.
document.title: nfl players and owners at impasse as judge's decision awaited
lines_and_colors: the labor dispute between nfl players and owners appeared at an impasse on thursday as both sides waited for a federal judge's ruling on the players' request to lift a league-imposed lockout.
